name: A Spaceship Called Stability
description:
Do you have what it takes to become a SUPER SPACEMAN PILOT?

HOW TO PLAY

Use the UP/LEFT/RIGHT arrows or W/A/D keys to move your spaceship.

Be careful not to leave the area!

Fly through all 10 gates before the time runs out.

When a ship system becomes UNSTABLE click the number panels in order to repair it.

CREDITS
